summary: Five high school students meet in Saturday detention and discover how they have a lot more in common than they thought.
cast: Emilio Estevez|Paul Gleason|Anthony Michael Hall|John Kapelos|Judd Nelson|Molly Ringwald|Ally Sheedy|Perry Crawford|Mary Christian|Ron Dean|Tim Gamble|Fran Gargano|Mercedes Hall|John Hughes
title: El club de los cinco
